briefdescription.para: Acquire a reference to the content.
Release reference to the content.
Retrieve the user pointer associated with the content.

simplesect.para: The user pointer associated with the content.

briefdescription.para: Assign a user pointer to the content.

parameterdescription.para: The user pointer to associate with the content.

briefdescription.para: Get the mime type of the content data.

simplesect.para: The mime type of the content data, for example "application".

briefdescription.para: Set the mime type of the content data.

parameterdescription.para: The mime type of the content data, for example "application".

briefdescription.para: Get the mime subtype of the content data.

simplesect.para: The mime subtype of the content data, for example "html".

briefdescription.para: Set the mime subtype of the content data.

parameterdescription.para: The mime subtype of the content data, for example "html".

briefdescription.para: Get the content data buffer, usually a string.
Set the content data buffer, usually a string.

parameterdescription.para: The size of the content data buffer.

briefdescription.para: Get the string content data buffer.
Set the string content data buffer.
Get the content data buffer size, excluding null character despite null character is always set for convenience.
Set the content data size, excluding null character despite null character is always set for convenience.
Get the encoding of the data buffer, for example "gzip".

simplesect.para: The encoding of the data buffer.

briefdescription.para: Set the encoding of the data buffer, for example "gzip".

parameterdescription.para: The encoding of the data buffer.

briefdescription.para: Get the name associated with a RCS file transfer message.

detaileddescription.para:
It is used to store the original filename of the file to be downloaded from server.
content
LinphoneContent object.
The name of the content.

briefdescription.para: Set the name associated with a RCS file transfer message.

detaileddescription.para:
It is used to store the original filename of the file to be downloaded from server.
content
LinphoneContent object.
name
The name of the content.

briefdescription.para: Tell whether a content is a multipart content.

simplesect.para: A boolean value telling whether the content is multipart or not.

briefdescription.para: Get a part from a multipart content according to its index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the part to get.

simplesect.para: A LinphoneContent object holding the part if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Find a part from a multipart content looking for a part header with a specified value.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the header to look for.
The value of the header to look for.

simplesect.para: A LinphoneContent object object the part if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get a custom header value of a content.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the header to get the value from.

simplesect.para: The value of the header if found, NULL otherwise.
